loggedout.explainer: Hiveinvite estas servo kiu ebligas al vi inviti viajn amikojn al Hive.

index.tokenexplain: Por krei Hive-konton, vi unue devas pretigi ĵetonon. Eblas fari tion per bruligo de certa kvanto da HIVE aŭ uzante grandan kvanton da Rimedokredito. Interŝanĝe, la nova konto ricevas minimuman kvanton da Rimedokredito por partopreni en la blokĉeno sen havi HP (investita HIVE).
index.tokencost: La nuna kosto por pretigo estas 0 HIVE aŭ 0 Rimedokredito
index.pendingclaims: Vi pretigis konton.
index.nopendingclaims: Vi ankoraŭ ne petis ajnan konton.
index.invitespending: Unu invito survojas,
index.noinvitespending: Neniu invito survojas,
index.invitemore: do vi nun povas inviti amikon!
index.invitemore_plural: do vi povas inviti 0 pliajn amikojn.
index.abletoclaim:
Via maksimuma Rimedokredito estas 0,
Vi nun estas je 0%,
index.canclaim: kio permesas al vi pretigi unu konton je 100%
index.canclaim_plural: kio permesas al vi pretigi 0 kontojn je 100%
index.cannotclaim: kio ne permesas al vi pretigi ajnan konton. Potencigu iom da HIVE!
index.canclaimnow: do vi nun povas pretigi unu konton tuj.
index.canclaimnow_plural: do vi povas pretigi 0 kontojn tuj.
index.cannotclaimnow: do vi devas atendi iom ĝis kiam vi povos pretigi rabatitan konton.
index.abletobuy: Kun via bilanco de 0 HIVE vi povas
index.canbuy: teorie pretigi unu plian konton.
index.canbuy_plural: teorie pretigi 0 pli da kontoj.
index.cannotbuy: ne plu pretigi ajnan konton. Ekhavu iom da HIVE!

freeclaimmodal.title: Pretigi rabatitajn Hive-kontojn
freeclaimmodal.explainer:
The last cost to claim a discounted account was 0 RC
Be aware that this changes all the time. When multiple accounts are claimed in a short period of time, the price rises.
freeclaimmodal.explainamount: With 0 RC you can claim one account.
freeclaimmodal.explainamount_plural: With 0 RC you can claim 0 accounts.
freeclaimmodal.moreexplain: You can claim either one single account, or use the claim bot until you run out of RC or stop it.

botclaimmodal.title: Automated claiming of discounted Hive accounts
botclaimmodal.explainer: Hi! I'm your friendly account claim robot. Click the button below to make me start working. I will keep claiming until you are out of RC, or tell me to stop with the other button.
botclaimmodal.working: At work! Claimed 0 accounts so far.
botclaimmodal.stopped:
Stopped after claiming 0 accounts.
Error message:

paidclaimmodal.title: Pay to claim a Hive account
paidclaimmodal.explainer:
The cost to claim an account is 0 HIVE
This cost is set by the witnesses.
A new account will receive a basic amount of RC as if he had the same amount of Hive Power.

invitemodal.title: Invite to Hive!
invitemodal.label: Label
invitemodal.by_email: Uncheck this to get one or multiple links directly instead of sending an email
invitemodal.mailtext:
Hello,

you have been invited by {} to join the Hive blockchain.

What is that?
Hive is the backend used by new social media sites like peakd.com and hive.blog. Using blockchain technology, it goes new ways by paying the users for their activity.

Accept the invitation by clicking on the following link:
invitemodal.multi: Create a link that is valid for multiple account creations
invitemodal.multi_label: Amount of accounts this link is valid for (take care, you may run out of claims using this option!)
invitemodal.public: Create a public invite with optional verification methods
invitemodal.response_time: Typical time until creation in hours
invitemodal.delegate: A new account only has a basic amount of RC to transact on the blockchain. If you want the new user to be able to do more, delegate some Hive Power. You can also do that later of course.
invitemodal.delegate_amount: Amount of Hive Power to delegate
invitemodal.validity: How many days should the invite be valid before being automatically deleted?

keys.active_required: This action requires your active key.

step0.text: Hive accounts are created by other users. To verify your identity and to have a line of communication if your keys get stolen, please fill out all fields below. This data will only be shared with the creator of your account.
step0.error: Please fill out all fields above

step1.lead: Hi! You are only a few steps away from getting your own Hive account!
step1.text:
Your account will include your personal wallet, so security is extremely important.
We have generated a master password for your account, which you need to keep in a safe location. Write it down somewhere!
step1.submit: I have written down the password and will never ever lose it

step2.lead: Okay. Make sure to not lose the password! There is no way to recover it!
step2.text: Your Hive username has to be at least three characters long, and can not contain other characters than lowercase letters, numbers and a dash. It has to be unique and can never be changed. Choose it carefully.

step3.text:
What we said about your password before was not a joke.
To verify you have not made a mistake while noting your password, please enter it here.
If you cannot proceed, reload the page in your browser and start over.

step4.text:
There are different access levels for a Hive account.
The posting key is used for everyday social media activity, i.e. it lets you post and vote.
To access your wallet and move HIVE, you need the active key.
The owner key can be used to change those two, and should never be used for other purposes. It's best kept besides the master password, don't use it online.
Last and least there's the memo key, which has no function yet but may in the future be used to decrypt your private data like direct messages.
step4.warning:
These keys are generated from your password. They can be used instead of it, but only for their specific purpose.
It's safer to use the posting key if you want to use a device to only post and vote, or the active key when you want to perform other actions.
THE PASSWORD AND THE OWNER KEY ARE BEST TO KEPT OFFLINE!
step4.confirm: By clicking the following button, the user who created your invitation will be informed, and hopefully create your account soon.
step4.finish: Finish account request and leave this site
